title: Chroma Skin Splashes?
body: Just bought the Zac Chroma Pack this morning and the screen says Sweet Zac with a green Zac on splash. Bug or intended? Was expecting a colorized splash.

replies.body: They would have to put in A LOT of extra time and artwork just to recolor splashes for chromas. It's not like they can just take the MS Paint "fill bucket" and recolor what they want to in the splash art.
That's actually pretty similar to what it takes to make a chroma. People make their own models all the time, it doesn't take more than half an hour on complex champions (or 5 minutes on Zac).

Hiya TehHaxxor,

This is working as intended - chromas won't have their own splash.
